tagline: Excitement of learning and new wonders
title: Online School
description: A space for learning, skill building, and academic growth

explore.title: Explore
explore.searchPlaceholder: Search for courses, blogs, and more...
explore.freeCoursesDesc: Show only courses that are free

courseDetail.skillsDesc: What you will learn in this course
courseDetail.noSkillsMessage: No skills have been registered for this course.
courseDetail.alreadyRegistered: You have registered for this course
courseDetail.syllabusPreparingMessage: This course is still in preparation.
courseDetail.prerequisitesDesc: Courses you should take before this course
courseDetail.noPrerequisitesDesc: This course is suitable for all levels.
courseDetail.whyPrerequisitesDesc: The importance of preparation before starting the course
courseDetail.discountCodeHelp: If you have a discount code, enter it here

feature.studentDesc: Start learning and expand your knowledge at any level. Every small step brings you closer to big achievements, and it’s never too late to learn.
feature.teacherDesc: Share your expertise and grow your knowledge. Teaching others strengthens your own understanding and expands your professional network.
feature.instituteDesc: Empower your team and build a culture of learning. Continuous improvement and knowledge sharing drive organizational success.

calendar.title: Learning Calendar
calendar.subtitle: Track course sessions and deadlines. Events are read-only for now.

login.noUserError: No user found with this number
login.phoneLengthError: Your phone number must be 11 digits
login.phoneFormatError: Your phone number must start with 09

marketing.mobileDesc: Learn directly inside the video. Ask questions on any moment and get instant AI answers without leaving the lesson.
marketing.performanceDesc: Jump to the exact section you are stuck on, ask your question there, and keep your focus on the topic. The player can also ask you questions at key moments to reinforce learning.
marketing.securityDesc: Take multiple‑choice quizzes and see your score on a live table to compete and improve with others.
marketing.apiDesc: Review related flashcards tied to the current lesson to strengthen memory and speed up revision.

blog.author: Author
blog.notFoundDesc: The blog post you're looking for doesn't exist or has been removed.
blog.shareErrorDesc: Failed to copy link. Please try again.
blog.loginRequiredDesc: Please login to like this blog post.
blog.likeError: Failed to like/unlike. Please try again.

link.title: Start Your Learning Journey Today
link.description: Join thousands of students already learning on our platform. Access exclusive courses, track your progress, and unlock your potential.

footer.description: A space for learning, skill building, and academic growth. Join thousands of students already learning on our platform.
